entries.name: Candles (5)
entries.hidden properties: [ARCANA 12] Used as a component of some rituals.
entries.properties: Can be lit and produce 20 ft radius of light for 1 hour.
entries.description: Wax candles with a threaded wick.

entries.name: Gunpowder
entries.hidden properties: [ALCHEMY P3 | NATURE 12] If gunpowder comes in contact with fire, it explodes. Anything within 5 ft takes 1d8 force damage and 2 fire damage.

entries.name: Healing potion
entries.hidden properties:
[INSPECTION 15] Smells earthy with a hint of bitterness.
[ARCANA 15 | ALCHEMY P2] Heals 10 health
entries.description: Deep red liquid, much like blood, yet has the consistency of water.

entries.name: Malt
entries.hidden properties: [ALCHEMY P1 | LORE 10] Used for brewing beers and ales.

entries.name: Ale (5 pints)
entries.saving throw: Willpower ST >= 8 + (number of pints drank in 12 hours): not drunk.
entries.hidden properties:
[LORE 8] Can cause drunk condition.
[WILLPOWER P5] Drunk after drinking a pint, unless ST (knows ST properties).
entries.description: Common barely-based alcoholic beverage found in almost every tavern.

entries.name: Axe beak egg
entries.hidden properties: [NATURE 12] Rarely unfertilized, if the egg is cared for and kept warm, it will hatch within 2 weeks. [APPRAISE 10] The right person could pay upwards of 500 gold for a ready-to-hatch egg; axe beak hatchlings are worthless if already hatched.
entries.description: A large white egg with a thick shell.

entries.name: Wine (1 glass)
entries.saving throw: Willpower ST >= 6 + (number of glasses drank in 12 hours): not drunk.
entries.hidden properties:
[LORE 8] Can cause drunk condition.
[WILLPOWER P5] Drunk after drinking a glass, unless ST (knows ST properties).
entries.description: Common grape-based alcoholic beverage found in nicer taverns.

entries.name: Fine wine (1 glass)
entries.saving throw: Willpower ST >= 8 + (number of glasses drank in 12 hours): not drunk.
entries.hidden properties:
[LORE 8] Can cause drunk condition.
[WILLPOWER P5] Drunk after drinking a glass, unless ST (knows ST properties).

entries.name: Rations (1 day)
entries.properties: Can feed one person for one day. Lasts one week.
entries.description: A hemp sack full of dry tasteless food.

entries.name: Animal feed (1 day)
entries.properties: Can feed one large herbivore animal for one day. Lasts one month.
entries.description: A large hemp sack full of grains.

entries.name: Tarleaf
entries.hidden properties:
[INSPECTION 13] Very bitter and numbs the mouth.
[NATURE 13 | ALCHEMY P1 | LORE 13] Leaves are usually dried and brewed into a tea. Helps calm hysteria and clears an unsettled mind. +4 in a check to break Fear or Confusion
entries.description: Dark sticky leaf of a berry bush.  Berries of the plant are poisonous.

entries.name: Winter Crest
entries.locality: Forest, Mountain; Only found in consistent snow cover.
entries.hidden properties:
If consumed, requires 14 Willpower ST, or Sick for 4 hours.[NATURE 13 | ALCHEMY P1] Slightly poisonous, if consumed.
[LORE 12] Wreaths of the plant are typically hung over doorways during The Sister's Embrace by devote followers of the Order of Kin and Shey. The token is called a Mnemonic Wreath, and is meant to be a sign of remembrance so that the Sisters do not forget the bearer during the dead of winter.
[LORE 16] If not dried properly, the roots of the wreath may attempt to bind to the door. Some folks suspect this to be good luck, but it is rather difficult to remove and can deteriorate the wood.
[NATURE 18] It's actually a fungus, and tends to feed on decaying frozen animals or plants.
entries.description: A shaggy bushy tangle of roots that spread through the snow instead of dirt. It sprouts unusual small bead-like leaves.
